title: Welcome to my AI Lab
text: This is a proof-of-concept post demonstrating scientific publishing capabilities with Quarto.

title: Welcome to my AI Lab
text:
Mathematical Formulation
We can render complex equations using LaTeX. For example, the Cross-Entropy Loss function:

L_{CE} = - \sum_{i=1}^{C} t_i \log(p_i)

Where: - t_i is the truth label. - p_i is the Softmax probability for the i^{th} class.

title: Welcome to my AI Lab
text:
Architecture Diagram
Here is a simple Neural Network visualizations using Mermaid.js:





graph LR
    A[Input Layer] --> B(Hidden Layer)
    B --> C{Activation}
    C --> D[Output Layer]
    style A fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style D fill:#ccf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
